name: Drive Snapshot Backup Continuation 2
summary: An SN2 file is a backup continuation file created by Drive Snapshot, a Windows backup utility created by Tom Ehlert. It contains the third portion of a backup disk image created by Drive Snapshot. SN2 files are always associated with accompanying .SNA and .SN1 files, and they may be associated with additional SN# continuation files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
